overview: Antonia Campos is a Yoreme woman from northern Sinaloa, México. She attends people who come to her looking for Holy Relief. She's a healer, a traditional doctor, and she tells us about her work and the alliance of Santo Macucho.

production_companies.name: Comisión Nacional para el Desarrollo de los Pueblos Indígenas

title: Mujer Yoreme (Curandera)
